definition: variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: I call these the DreamBusters in life.
sentences.chinese: 我把他们成为生命中的梦想克星。

sentences.english: Did the police arrest the ball buster, or were they afraid to?
sentences.chinese: 警方逮捕了这名蛋蛋克星吗，还是他们也很怕她？

sentences.english: Just imagine all the DreamBusters that were in Noah's life.
sentences.chinese: 只要想想诺亚那个时代，他身边所有的梦想克星吧。

sentences.english: And with this creeping comes a new adversary for the not-invented-here syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 而应运而来的是产生了非原创综合病症的克星。

sentences.english: "I had never been to Lexington, " Lipson said.
sentences.chinese: “我从来没去过列克星顿市，”立普生说道。

sentences.english: Adbusters posted on its website in July.
sentences.chinese: 《广告克星》7月份在其网站上发布了这样一个问题。

sentences.english: Freedom of association is regarded as a threat by dictators .
sentences.chinese: 结社自由是政党专制或大人物专权的克星。

sentences.english: But the most influential DreamBuster in your life is you.
sentences.chinese: 然而，在你生命中，最有影响力的梦想克星是你自己。

sentences.english: Alas, Lexington is not at liberty to disclose next week’s fake news.
sentences.chinese: 唉，可惜列克星敦不能随意透露下周的假新闻啊。

sentences.english: The Lexington carried about one thousand five hundred crew members.
sentences.chinese: 列克星敦号装载了大约一千五百名船员。

sentences.english: and that’s on Lexington and 25th street.
sentences.chinese: 柏鲁克分校是在莱克星敦，25号大街。

sentences.english: Wealthy suburbs like Weston and Lexington are top choices.
sentences.chinese: 像韦斯顿和列克星敦市的郊外房产最受人青睐。

sentences.english: We’ve all heard about antioxidants as cancer fighters.
sentences.chinese: 我们都听说过抗氧化剂是抗癌的克星。

sentences.english: Jackson was buried in Lexington, Virginia.
sentences.chinese: 杰克逊葬于弗吉尼亚列克星敦市。

sentences.english: Resistance melted away at Lexington, and the British moved on to Concord.
sentences.chinese: 反抗迅速波及整个莱克星顿，英国军队撤退至康科德。

definition: lit. one object bests another object/every item has a weakness (idiom)/there is a rock to every scissor, a scissor to every paper, and a paper to every rock
to sweep everything before one/to be invincible (idiom)
(of a spirit or deity) to possess sb
no stronghold one cannot overcome (idiom); to conquer every obstacle/nothing one can't do/to carry everything before one
